title: "Southeast Asia eyes hands-off AI rules, defying EU ambitions"
excerpt: "With almost 700 million people and over a thousand ethnic groups and cultures, Southeast Asian countries have widely divergent rules governing censorship, misinformation, public content and hate speech that would likely affect AI regulation. Thailand, for example, has laws against criticising its monarchy."
